title: Congrats to the Phinneys!
content: Wonderful news. I imagine him to be a great father.
author: Giampa

comments.content:
Wonderful news! Best of health.   
   
hhp
Congratulations Tom
Congratulations! Best to both you and your wife (who did all the hard work!)

Thanks, all. I'm sitting here at the hospital right now, on dial-up. Just spent about three hours with Miranda, and we're going to take a nap until next feeding time.   
   
Cheers,   
   
T
Fï¿½licitations aux 2 parents!
best luck for your kid ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825173947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Congrats :-D
congrats tom! take some time off the type boards! ;^)
Congratulations Tom! May her smiles fuel yours...
Congrats!

Admired Miranda!   
   
Congratulations, Veronica & Thomas.   
   
It doesn't get better than parenthood.
Wonderful news. Congratulations!

![people partying](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825173947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/37422.gif)   
   
That's wonderful! Congratulations, Veronica and Thomas.
Woo-hoo! Congratulations!
Congratulations, Thomas!

Contagulations Tom! Best to the growing family!   
   
:D

Well done Veronica and Tom!   
And what a beautiful name for baby.
Congrats Thomas!
That's great, congratulations! Glad everything went smoothly.

Congratulations!   
   
Here, have a cigar...   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825173947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/37436.gif)   
   
   
Post pictures of the little one when you can!
Congratulations to you both!

Congratulations, T!   
   
(Was it Tim Rowlands' font that did it?)   
   
(Or Shakespeare?)   
   
Victor
Congratulations, Thomas!
congratulations from clare and myself tom ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825173947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
oh, hey--maybe you should teach her the assignment of every Unicode codepoint simultaneously with English... interesting!

What a lucky little girl, to be the daughter of two wonderful, kind, and intelligent people...!   
   
Congratulations Thomas and Veronica!

Thomas and family,   
The best days of my life have come since the birth of my children. Being constantly exhausted has many rewards.   
YOU MUST!!!! POST PICTURES!!! My wife and I live for baby pictures. Cherish this day.   
   
Chris

Warmest congratulations!   
   
Now which font to choose for the   
birth announcements? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825173947im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
This is not an original addition to this thread, but...Congratulations Tom and Veronica!
Congratulations Veronika and Thomas! Welcome to this most amazing and rewarding of experiences -- and may Miranda be blessed with health, happiness, and good fortune.

Welcome to the world Miss beautiful Miranda!!!   
   
I see she prefers the digits to the letters :-)   
   
ChrisL

_I see she prefers the digits to the letters :-)_    
   
No, that's Thomas hinting by hand. ;-)
Congratulations, Thomas -- great news!
Congrats Thomas!

Thanks, all!   
   
Veronica and I were finally able to bring Miranda home from the hospital yesterday evening. Everybody is doing well.   
   
I have made the happy discovery that it's possible to cuddle your baby and do email at the same time, as long as you have a sling or similar baby carrying device, and are a good touch typist.

_sling or similar baby carrying device, and are a good touch typist._   
   
That disqualifies me.   
   
Congratulations Thomas and Veronica.   
   
Kern baby! Kern!   
   
Jon
